posts.post_content:
Asking $80/dlvd or trade on a T206 HOF that I need.

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=182409[/url]

[URL=http://s699.photobucket.com/user/matuxhorn/media/Misc/T206KelleySGC20Front_zps0c34c799.jpg.html][IMG]http://i699.photobucket.com/albums/vv353/matuxhorn/Misc/T206KelleySGC20Front_zps0c34c799.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

[URL=http://s699.photobucket.com/user/matuxhorn/media/Misc/T206KelleySGC20Back_zps7609e7dd.jpg.html][IMG]http://i699.photobucket.com/albums/vv353/matuxhorn/Misc/T206KelleySGC20Back_zps7609e7dd.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
I will take the Kelley. Please let me know where to send a regular PayPal payment.

Matt,

The card arrived over the weekend.  Thank you very much for a great transaction.

Best regards,

Eric
